# Load in libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tm)
library(tidytext)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(pdftools)
```

# Scrape book pdf

```{r}
text <- pdf_text("TakingMoralActionFinal-3.pdf")
```

## Basic info

```{r}
# Author, version, etc
pdf_info("TakingMoralActionFinal-3.pdf")

# Table of contents
pdf_toc("TakingMoralActionFinal-3.pdf") # doesn't work well here
```


## Look at some pages

```{r}
print(text[57])
```
